p: H3-subtype AIV (HA: 2 8) was diluted 1:10–1:10 5, and testing revealed that the OD 450nm value was greater than the cutoff value. When the H3 virus was diluted 1:10 6, the OD 450nm value fluctuated around the cutoff value. When the dilution was 1:10 7, the OD 450nm value was less than the cutoff value, thus the sample was reported as negative (Fig. 3c). Each sample was assayed three times under the same conditions on different days, and the replicate analyses produced very similar results.
